entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
